 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָכַד‎</span><sub>121</sub> **verb** ==capture, seize, take== (by lot) (Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לכד‎</span> ***take out, choose*** (?); [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְכַד‎</span> as Biblical Hebrew; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***strike, push***, with the hand, etc., <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pestle***, compare modern <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***attack*** [[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]]<sup>ZMG xxii. 1868, 140</sup>; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***stick*** or ***cleave*** to); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Josh.8.1|Josh 8:1]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָכַדְתִּי‎</span> [[2Sam.12.27|2Sam 12:27]] etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִלְכּוֺד‎</span> [[Amos.3.5|Amos 3:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּלְכֹּד‎</span> [[Judg.8.12|Judg 8:12]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָכְדָהּ‎</span> [[2Sam.12.28|2Sam 12:28]], masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִכְדוּ‎</span>; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָכוֺד‎</span> [[Amos.3.5|Amos 3:5]] ***construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְלָכְדֵנִי‎</span> [[Jer.18.22|Jer 18:22]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְלָכְדָהּ‎</span> [[Jer.32.24|Jer 32:24]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹכֵד‎</span> [[Job.5.13|Job 5:13]]; [[Prov.16.32|Prov 16:32]] — 

**1.** ***capture, seize*** (not in [[BDB#P|P]]) with accusative, usually a city or town, in war [[Judg.1.8|Judg 1:8]]; [[Judg.1.12|Judg 1:12]]; [[Josh.8.21|Josh 8:21]]; [[Josh.10.1|Josh 10:1]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.2.35|Deut 2:35]] + 48 t. (but [[Judg.1.18|Judg 1:18]] strike out as gloss [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#GFM|GFM]] and others); land [[Josh.10.42|Josh 10:42]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), [[Dan.11.18|Dan 11:18]] water-courses (fords), [[Judg.3.28|Judg 3:28]]; [[Judg.7.24|Judg 7:24]] (twice in verse); [[Judg.12.8|Judg 12:8]] object men (usually princes, kings) in battle [[Judg.7.25|Judg 7:25]]; [[Judg.8.12|Judg 8:12]]; [[Judg.8.14|Judg 8:14]]; [[Josh.11.12|Josh 11:12]]; [[Josh.11.17|Josh 11:17]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), [[2Chr.22.9|2Chr 22:9]]; [[2Chr.33.11|2Chr 33:11]] captives and spoils [[2Sam.8.4|2Sam 8:4]] = [[1Chr.18.4|1Chr 18:4]] of Saul's seizing the kingdom (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּלוּכָה‎</span>), i.e. acquiring it actually by force of arms [[1Sam.14.47|1Sam 14:47]] also of Samson's ***catching*** the foxes [[Judg.15.4|Judg 15:4]] of a lion ***catching*** his prey [[Amos.3.4|Amos 3:4]] of a trap, snare, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָכוֺד יִלְכּוֺד‎</span> [[Amos.3.5|Amos 3:5]]. 

**2.** figurative of entrapping men [[Jer.5.26|Jer 5:26]]; [[Ps.35.8|Ps 35:8]], compare [[Prov.5.22|Prov 5:22]]; [[Job.5.13|Job 5:13]] and (of a pit) [[Jer.18.22|Jer 18:22]]. 

**3.** of ***taking*** by lot [[Josh.7.14|Josh 7:14]] (3 t. in verse); [[Josh.7.17|Josh 7:17]] ([[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; see **Niph\`al 3**).

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִלְכַּד‎</span> [[Lam.4.20|Lam 4:20]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִלְכְּדָה‎</span> [[1Kgs.16.18|1Kgs 16:18]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִלָּכֵד‎</span> [[Isa.24.18|Isa 24:18]]; [[Jer.48.44|Jer 48:44]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִלָּ֫כֶד כָּהּ‎</span> [[Eccl.7.26|Eccl 7:26]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּלָּכֵד‎</span> [[Josh.7.16|Josh 7:16]] +, etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִלְכָּד‎</span> [[Josh.7.15|Josh 7:15]] — 

**1.** ***be captured*** in war, of city [[1Kgs.16.18|1Kgs 16:18]]; [[2Kgs.18.10|2Kgs 18:10]]; [[Jer.38.28|Jer 38:28]] (twice in verse); [[Jer.48.1|Jer 48:1]]; [[Jer.48.41|Jer 48:41]]; [[Jer.50.2|Jer 50:2]]; [[Jer.50.9|Jer 50:9]]; [[Jer.50.24|Jer 50:24]]; [[Jer.51.31|Jer 51:31]]; [[Jer.51.41|Jer 51:41]]; [[Zech.14.2|Zech 14:2]] of men [[Jer.51.56|Jer 51:56]]; [[Lam.4.20|Lam 4:20]] (compare **Qal 1**). 

**2.** of men, ***be caught***, namely, in a snare or trap, only figurative, usually by divine judgment [[Isa.8.15|Isa 8:15]]; [[Isa.24.18|Isa 24:18]]; [[Isa.28.13|Isa 28:13]]; [[Ps.9.16|Ps 9:16]]; [[Ps.59.13|Ps 59:13]]; [[Prov.6.2|Prov 6:2]]; [[Prov.11.6|Prov 11:6]]; [[Jer.6.11|Jer 6:11]]; [[Jer.8.9|Jer 8:9]] so of Moab [[Jer.48.7|Jer 48:7]]; [[Jer.48.44|Jer 48:44]] of being ***ensnared*** by a woman [[Eccl.7.26|Eccl 7:26]] of being ***caught*** by cords of distress, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּחַבְלֵי עֹ֑נִי‎</span>, [[Job.36.8|Job 36:8]]. 

**3.** ***be taken*** by lot [[Josh.7.15|Josh 7:15]]; [[Josh.7.16|Josh 7:16]]; [[Josh.7.17|Josh 7:17]]; [[Josh.7.18|Josh 7:18]] (all [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Sam.10.20|1Sam 10:20]]; [[1Sam.10.21|1Sam 10:21]] (twice in verse); [[1Sam.14.41|1Sam 14:41]]; [[1Sam.14.42|1Sam 14:42]] (compare **Qal 3**).

**Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְלַכְּדוּ וְלֹא יִתְפָּרָ֑דוּ‎</span> [[Job.41.9|Job 41:9]] ***they grasp each other, and cannot be separated***, of crocodile's scales (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ בְּאָחִיהוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְדֻבָּ֑קוּ‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּנֵי תְהוֺם יִתְלַכָּ֑דוּ‎</span> [[Job.38.30|Job 38:30]] ***the face of the deep compacts*** (of freezing; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּאֶבֶן מַיִם יִתְחַבָּ֑אוּ‎</span>; verbs transposed, plausibly, by [[BDB#Me|Me]] [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]).
